name: JUST BLACK AND WHITE TANK GAME
name_original: JUST BLACK AND WHITE TANK GAME
description:
This tank game is inspired by the classic game: Battle City/Tank1990.

Just like in the classic "tanks",  your goal is to defend your base and destroy all enemies, but in this game time is limited.

Each time the time runs out, your base is destroyed or you are shot down, you lose one life.

When the number of lives drops to 0, you lose.

Levels in the game are randomly generated.

With each level the opponents become stronger and there are more and more of them.

After every 5 levels you get an extra life.

Controls:

-WASD or Arrows - move

-Enter - pause -F1 - full screen (only in desktop version)

-Esc - return to menu

-Space or Enter -select

Btw the game itself is not very serious.

If you are interested, the sounds (including music) are from freesounds.org .

If you find any bugs, let me know about them.

Good luck :)
